document.topic_text: Ginger Zee investigates how climate affects Michigan cherries Katie Sakala, WZZM 7:06 AM. EDT August 10, 2016 Cherries CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN GOOGLE+ PINTEREST TRAVERSE CITY, MICH. - In a new online series, ABC's Chief Meteorologist Ginger Zee explores how climate impacts our foods. One of her adventures brings her to Traverse City, Michigan, to investigate how the weather affects the cherry crop. WZZM 13's Health Reporter Valerie Lego got a chance to talk with her before the episode airs online. You can watch all of Ginger Zee's food explorations around the country by clicking here . (© 2016 WZZM)
